humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the microscopic measurement of the invasive ductal carcinoma as 7mm. According to the rules, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive ductal carcinoma measured 7mm in size (Breast Pathologic Parameters, 1. Invasive carcinoma, A. Microscopic measurement: 7mm). According to the TNM staging system, T1 indicates a tumor that is 2cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.
